title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 151-7.3 - Reporting requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 151-7.3 - Reporting requirements

State Regulations

By June 1 of each year, starting in 2018, every workers' compensation rate service organization shall submit a report to the superintendent regarding policies receiving a credit pursuant to this Part, including policy year payrolls, indemnity losses, indemnity claim counts, and medical losses by classification, and such other information as the superintendent may require. Every workers'compensation rate service organization shall report the information, including adjustments, consistent with the comparable classification relativity review. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
§§
151-7.3

Adopted

New

York State Register November 23, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 47, eff. 11/23/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
